task.title: Write an article title
task.shortdesc: Follow these guidelines to better help users find your article.

step.cmd: Use this framework for the title: "[software] [version(s) if applicable]: [verb]"
Use the active voice for the verb.
step.info: DO NOT use the 'ing' form of the verb.
Example 2: Drupal Enterprise: Enable Folwell Theme

step.cmd: Write a concise sentence summarizing the content
step.info: The summarizing sentence should ideally be less than 10 wordsUse title case.

step.cmd: Use primary keywords related to the content in the first several words.

step.info: These words are generic and take up space when at the beginning of a title.

step.cmd: DO NOT lead with commonly used words such as "How to."
